'''''Mallorn'' 23''' is the twenty-third issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s annual journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)|Mallorn]]'', published in the summer of [[1986]]. The issue includes the poem ''[[Goblin Feet]]'' by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
==Contents==
* Cover Illustration
** By: [[Pauline Baynes]]
* Editorial
** By: Denis Bridoux
* The Use and Misuse of Fantasy
** By: Kathleen Jones
* From Innocence to Experience: the "naivet√©" of J.R.R. Tolkien
** By: [[John Ellison]]
* Book Review: ''[[The Lays of Beleriand]]''
** By: [[Charles Noad]]
* Of Amalion
** By: Denis Bridoux
* Art: Yavanna
** By: Jan Claridge
* Warg, Wearg, Earg and Werewolf
** By: [[John Ryan|J.S. Ryan]]
* The Fairy Tale Tradition
** By: [[Christina Scull]]
* ''[[Goblin Feet]]''
** By: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
* Mallorn Mail: Letters to the Editor
* Art: The Gardens of Irmo
** By: Howard Bates
* ''The last Elf's Song at the End of Time''
** By: Jeremy Morgan
* Where to write
* [[The Tolkien Society]]

*Inside Art
** By: Steve Lines, [[Ted Nasmith]], Howard Bates, [[Brian Sibley]], Denis Bridoux, Timo Raittila, [[Kay Woollard]]
